title: Bai Suzhen
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all draconians, see [list of draconians](/List_of_draconians "List of draconians").* *For a list of all dragons, see [list of dragons](/List_of_dragons "List of dragons").*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A weary draconian with foreign and watery scales. She has come to the Dungeon in hopes of resurrecting her mortal husband; a noble cause, for a being once known for quarreling with saints and flooding unfortunate temples. If pressed to her limits, she will reveal her true form, the mere sight of which struck her husband dead. Adventurers may wish they were so lucky! |

## Contents

- [1 Draconian Form](#Draconian_Form)

  - [1.1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
  - [1.2 Location](#Location)

- [2 Spells](#Spells)

- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)

- [4 Dragon Form](#Dragon_Form)
  - [4.1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info_2)

- [5 Spells](#Spells_2)

- [6 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks_2)

- [7 History](#History)

## Draconian Form

### Useful Info

**Bai Suzhen, Madame White Snake** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") mid- to late-game draconian wayfarer. While she's no [Tiamat](/Tiamat "Tiamat"), she does have more [HP](/HP "HP") and [AC](/AC "AC") than most [draconians](/List_of_draconians "List of draconians"), and can summons [hydras](/Hydra "Hydra") to her side. She always spawns with a [quarterstaff](/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff").

When she reaches half health, she transforms into her true form - [see below](#Dragon_Form) for details.

### Location

- [The Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths"): 1-3
- [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls"): 3
- [The Swamp](/The_Swamp "The Swamp"): 3-4
- [The Snake Pit](/The_Snake_Pit "The Snake Pit"): 3-4
- [The Shoals](/The_Shoals "The Shoals"): 3-4
- [The Spider's Nest](/The_Spider%27s_Nest "The Spider's Nest"): 3-4
- [Vaults](/Vaults "Vaults"): 2-5
- [Crypt](/Crypt "Crypt"): 1-3

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                              |                                                     |
| :---------- | -------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Summon Hydra](/Summon_Hydra "Summon Hydra") | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- While Bai Suzhen is still in her base draconian form, do your best to fight her in a corridor or other chokepoint. You don't need two or three hydras chewing on you while you're trying to fight her.
- Make sure you have a source of electricity resistance handy; a [potion of resistance](/Potion_of_resistance "Potion of resistance") will work if you have no other options. She can't deal any electrical damage as a draconian, but once she gets hurt...

## Dragon Form

| Bai Suzhen D [![Bai Suzhen (dragon).png](/images/7/7c/Bai_Suzhen_%28dragon%29.png)](/File:Bai_Suzhen_\(dragon\).png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                                       | 122-247                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [HD](/Hit_dice "Hit dice")                                                                                           | 20                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                                                       | 5259                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Speed](/Monster_speed "Monster speed")                                                                              | 10                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                                                                   | 22                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [EV](/Evasion "Evasion")                                                                                             | 4                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                                                       | 100                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| Attack1                                                                                                              | 30 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Attack2                                                                                                              | 16 ([claw](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| Attack3                                                                                                              | 16 ([trample](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [trample](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                                              | [rC+](/Cold "Cold") [rElec+++](/Electricity "Electricity") [rPois+](/Poison "Poison")                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                                                    | [Silver](/Silver "Silver")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                                                        | Land                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                                         | [Human](/Category:Human_intelligence "Category:Human intelligence")                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                                                     | [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors")                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                                                     | [Natural](/Category:Natural_holiness "Category:Natural holiness")                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [Size](/Size "Size")                                                                                                 | [Giant](/Category:Giant_monsters "Category:Giant monsters")                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Type](/Type "Type")                                                                                                 | dragon, storm dragon                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Flags                                                                                                                | [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") [Flying](/Flying "Flying") [Speaks](/Speaks "Speaks") [Cold-blooded](/Blood_temperature "Blood temperature") [Unique](/Unique_monster "Unique monster") [Female](/Category:Female_monsters "Category:Female monsters") |

### Useful Info

As Bai Suzhen reaches half health, she'll transform into a [storm dragon](/Storm_dragon "Storm dragon"), dropping her weapon and replacing her spellset. In this form, she has a permanent ring of [storm clouds](/Clouds#Thunder "Clouds") around adjacent tiles (dealing electric damage each turn), increased AC, [trample](/Trample "Trample") attacks, and a powerful [Primal Wave](/Primal_Wave "Primal Wave") breath attack. Even after recovering HP, she'll permanently stay in this form.

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                  |                                                                                                           |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Primal Wave](/Primal_Wave "Primal Wave") (3d26) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Breath flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Once Bai Suzhen transforms, she gains the ability to [knock you back](/Trample "Trample"), potentially out of your chokepoint. Fortunately, any summoned hydras that are still around are going to be reluctant to enter her ring of storm clouds, but they could cause issues if they can find a way around to you before timing out.
- Kiting Bai Suzhen in her dragon form is made more difficult by her Primal Wave, which not only deals decent damage (especially if you aren't [amphibious](/Amphibious "Amphibious") or [unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing")) but also creates pools of [shallow water](/Shallow_water "Shallow water") beneath you. If you can't move easily through water, start flying so you aren't slowed down. Keep in mind that any summoned hydras that are still around move faster in water.

## History

- In [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), Bai Suzhen will get more HPs and will use Primal Wave a little more often. Also, she'll transform into a dragon when at less than 75% health instead of less than 50%.
- In [0.26](/0.26 "0.26"), her [Ring of Thunder](/Ring_of_Thunder "Ring of Thunder") spell was replaced with a permanent enchantment.
- Bai Suzhen was introduced in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19").
html:
Bai Suzhen

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all draconians, see list of draconians. For a list of all dragons, see list of dragons.

Bai Suzhen d 
HP 122-247
HD 20
XP 5316
Speed 10
AC 14
EV 8
Will 100
Attack1 24 (hit: plain)
Attack2 14 (tail slap: plain)


Resistances rC+
rElec+++
rPois+
Vulnerabilities Silver
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type dragon, storm dragon
Flags See invisible
Speaks
Cold-blooded
Unique
Female
A weary draconian with foreign and watery scales. She has come to the Dungeon in hopes of resurrecting her mortal husband; a noble cause, for a being once known for quarreling with saints and flooding unfortunate temples. If pressed to her limits, she will reveal her true form, the mere sight of which struck her husband dead. Adventurers may wish they were so lucky!

Contents

  • 1 Draconian Form
    • 1.1 Useful Info
    • 1.2 Location
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 Dragon Form
    • 4.1 Useful Info
  • 5 Spells
  • 6 Tips & Tricks
  • 7 History

Draconian Form

Useful Info

Bai Suzhen, Madame White Snake is a unique mid- to late-game draconian wayfarer. While she's no Tiamat, she does have more HP and AC than most draconians, and can summons hydras to her side. She always spawns with a quarterstaff.

When she reaches half health, she transforms into her true form - see below for details.

Location

  • The Depths: 1-3
  • Elven Halls: 3
  • The Swamp: 3-4
  • The Snake Pit: 3-4
  • The Shoals: 3-4
  • The Spider's Nest: 3-4
  • Vaults: 2-5
  • Crypt: 1-3

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Summon Hydra Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • While Bai Suzhen is still in her base draconian form, do your best to fight her in a corridor or other chokepoint. You don't need two or three hydras chewing on you while you're trying to fight her.
  • Make sure you have a source of electricity resistance handy; a potion of resistance will work if you have no other options. She can't deal any electrical damage as a draconian, but once she gets hurt...

Dragon Form

Bai Suzhen D 
HP 122-247
HD 20
XP 5259
Speed 10
AC 22
EV 4
Will 100
Attack1 30 (bite: plain)
Attack2 16 (claw: plain)
Attack3 16 (trample: trample)
Resistances rC+
rElec+++
rPois+
Vulnerabilities Silver
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Giant
Type dragon, storm dragon
Flags See invisible
Flying
Speaks
Cold-blooded
Unique
Female

Useful Info

As Bai Suzhen reaches half health, she'll transform into a storm dragon, dropping her weapon and replacing her spellset. In this form, she has a permanent ring of storm clouds around adjacent tiles (dealing electric damage each turn), increased AC, trample attacks, and a powerful Primal Wave breath attack. Even after recovering HP, she'll permanently stay in this form.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Primal Wave (3d26) Natural flag,
Breath flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Once Bai Suzhen transforms, she gains the ability to knock you back, potentially out of your chokepoint. Fortunately, any summoned hydras that are still around are going to be reluctant to enter her ring of storm clouds, but they could cause issues if they can find a way around to you before timing out.
  • Kiting Bai Suzhen in her dragon form is made more difficult by her Primal Wave, which not only deals decent damage (especially if you aren't amphibious or unbreathing) but also creates pools of shallow water beneath you. If you can't move easily through water, start flying so you aren't slowed down. Keep in mind that any summoned hydras that are still around move faster in water.

History

  • In 0.31, Bai Suzhen will get more HPs and will use Primal Wave a little more often. Also, she'll transform into a dragon when at less than 75% health instead of less than 50%.
  • In 0.26, her Ring of Thunder spell was replaced with a permanent enchantment.
  • Bai Suzhen was introduced in 0.19.
